extension.description: This addon can play and test various video and audio content from various sources supported by Streamlink resolver library. It can also playback MPEG-DASH streams.

extension.news:
[B]1.5.2[/B] - 11-11-2019 - Enhanced context menu items - Added sleep when doing file operations (useful for slower devices) - Bug fixes, mostly player related
[B]1.5.1[/B] - 23-08-2019 - Add exception to headers object loop finder in case it fails
[B]1.5.0[/B] - 20-06-2019 - Updated generic plugin (thank you back-to) - Added youtube-dl as optional dependency to augment the generic plugin - Added ability to set custom title from plugin url - Added ability to set custom thumbnail from plugin url (as "image" parameter)

0.1.4 23.07.2019 Added Dutch language (Special thanks to Tinuz97). Clean up project files.
0.1.3 21.07.2019 Added OS user login. Fixed debug option. Added more debug information. Massive code rewrite. Several optimizations. Added audio language exclusions. Added video addon exclusions. Improved sorting settings. Improved settings layout. Added Do nothing option.

0.1.1 12.06.2019 Fixed release detection bug. Fixed typo.
0.1.0 10.06.2019 Fixed instalation bug. Fixed notifications bug. Started Beta convergence. Added default behavior selection. Added auto donwload any subtitle if no match found. Updated settings xml. Updated strings po. Release type detection improved.

extension.news: [B]2.0.Χ[/B] - Extraction method for zip files is now performed by python library by default, kodi built-in as fallback - Removed notification for broad search terms and tweaked various functions and regexes to allow them - Install vfs.libarchive on Leia, whenever possible via builtin command - Replaced subtitles.gr domain with an alternative one by default, old one kept as optional - Sort subtitles.gr items according to rating (downloads) - Various other tweaks - Bumped dependencies

extension.news:
v0.16.1 (2019-12-14) -Allowed to export individual seasons to the library (manual mode) -Dolby atmos audio streams are now specified (Kodi 19) -Added workaround to fix skin widgets -Handled subtitle properties for next version of InputStream Adaptive -Introduced accurate handling of subtitles (Kodi 19) -Improved handling of subtitles (Kodi 18) -Improved return to main page from search dialog -Improved cancel login dialog after the logout -Improved timeout on IPC over HTTP -Fixed an issue that showed the wrong label while browsing movies -Fixed ParentalControl/Rating GUI on custom skins -Fixed an issue that cause unicodedecode error on some android devices -Fixed an issue that can cause unicodedecode error in user/password -Added japanese language -Updated kr, hu, pt_br, fr -Many improvements to the code
v0.16.0 (2019-11-29) -Added new parental control settings -Added new thumb rating to movies/tv shows -Started migrating to watched status marks by profile -Optimized startup code -Better handled no internet connection -Fixed an issue that breaks the service when there is no internet connection -Fixed an issue in some specific cases request at startup credentials even if already saved -Fixed an issue did not show any error to the user when the loading of profiles fails -Fixed an issue that did not allow the display of the skip button in the Kodi library -New Hungarian language -Updated de, hr, it, pl, pt_br translations -Other minor improvements/fixes

extension.description: Audrey takes a JSON feed (stored locally or online) and from this builds a Kodi addon
Listen to TV Theme music and songs from different television shows
.Kodi Log Emailer
Live On YouTube

IMDb'de bulunan film fragmanlarını izle.
Watch free episodes from cartoonnetwork.com[CR][CR][B]Follow me @ twitter.com/jsergio123[/B]
extension.disclaimer: Feel free to use this script.

extension.description:
Provide a mapping between Super Favourites plugin + IPTV channels + XMLTV of your choice, 1) Mandatory: Choose your XMLTV location 2) Mandatory: Choose your Super Favourites folder that will contain auto created sub folder where you will put your iptv links 3) Option: Tune options like timezone, etc... ( optional settings tab ) 4) Style: Customize your SFX look and feel ( look and feel tab ). 5) Add your iptv links to the correct folder ( with super favourites regular addon ) 6) Start the plugin
All contributions are welcome: coding / tests debug / translations / donations, our mail and paypal address : 007.nux@gmail.com

Fournit un mapping entre le plugin Super Favourites + vos liens IPTV + votre fichier XMLTV, 1) Obligatoire: Définissez l'endroit ou se trouve votre fichier XMLTV. 2) Obligatoire: Choisissez le répertoire Super Favourites qui contiendra les sous répertoires créés automatiquement, ou vous irez placer vos liens iptv. 3) Optionnel: Affinez vos paramètres de time shift, etc ... ( onglet optionnel ) 4) Style: Customisez le style de la grille epg ( Style ) 5) Peuplez les sous dossiers avec vos liens IPTV ( avec le plugin super favourites régulier ) 6) Vous y êtes ! Toute contribution est la bienvenue: code/ tests debug / traductions / dons, notre adresse mail et paypal : 007.nux@gmail.com
extension.news: Beta relese 1.1.2 beta 3 Contributions: ----------------- Thank's to Adulescente for hard testing

extension.description: Diaspora TV addon
Πρόσθετο Διασπορά ΤΒ
Playlist Loader
Playlist Loader
extension.news:
1.3.0 - Added default icons. - Added transparency to existing icons for better themes integration. - Added virtual directories feature allowing a better categorization of m3u lists. - Refresh favourites list when moving an item. - Ability to move playlists root and directories sides. - Refresh playlists and directories when moving an item. - Disabled TvDb and MovieDb for now ( waiting for improvements )
1.2.1 - Taking ownership of the addon, see : https://github.com/avigdork/xbmc-avigdork/pull/8#issuecomment-416955692 - Fixed regex => grouping issue when tvg-logo was empty. - Added icon image also when items are grouped. - Regex fix for title containing comas. - Added TheTvDb scan for each lists in contextual menu ( beta ).
